hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Umar: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) went out by one road on the day of the 'Id (festival) and returned by another

chapter.ara-name: باب يَخْرُجُ إِلَى الْعِيدِ فِي طَرِيقٍ وَيَرْجِعُ فِي طَرِيقٍ
chapter.eng-name: Going To The 'Eid (Prayer) From One Path, And Returning From Another
